original_title: BREAKING: President Trump just called for Tina Peters RELEASE! He says there will be “HARSH MEASURES” taken if she’s not!  — The Donald
article_summary: President Trump calls for the release of Tina Peters, threatening "harsh measures" if she isn't, in a post urging supporters to show their support. The context suggests Peters is in jail, possibly for political reasons, and Trump's followers are advocating for her freedom.</s>
